content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Extraction System Interface at position (-3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
– Extraction system burner inserter located at (–3.5, 27.5) with a drop position at (–3.5, 28.5).

### Copper Cable Factory at position (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
– Cable factory input chest at (2.5, 17.5).
– New factory burner inserter at (3.5, 17.5) placed using direction RIGHT.
  • This burner inserter connects with a secondary burner inserter at (2.5, 16.5) and an assembling machine at (1.5, 19.5).

### Depot Belt Depot at position (3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
– Wooden chest placed at (3.5, 15.5) serving as the belt depot.
– Transport belt segment positioned at (4.5, 15.5) adjacent to the depot chest.
– Depot burner inserter located at (3.5, 14.5) (using direction UP) with neighbours including the wooden chest at (3.5, 15.5) and the transport belt at (4.5, 15.5).

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Belt Connection Target Errors
 – Multiple attempts to connect transport belts resulted in errors stating that transport belts cannot be connected directly to a Prototype.SteamEngine object.
  Tip: Always verify that the target entity for a belt connection is a valid inserter (i.e. one that feeds items into the intended machine) rather than a steam engine.

• Placement Distance Error
 – An error occurred when attempting to place a wooden chest at (3.5, 15.5) from a player position at (0, 0), indicating the target is too far.
  Tip: Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the entity to remain within the maximum placement distance.

• Undefined Variable Error
 – A NameError was raised due to the undefined variable “target_chest” during target determination.
  Tip: Ensure all variables are correctly defined and referenced; verify the variable names match those intended (e.g. using “target_pos” or an appropriate alternative).

• Inventory Shortage Error
 – An error was logged when no wooden chest was found in the inventory during a placement attempt.
  Tip: Check that the required item exists in the inventory prior to placement operations.
